pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interactive Circular Visualization of Genomic Data using 'htmlwidgets' and 'BioCircos.js' // Implement in 'R' interactive Circos-like visualizations of genomic data, to map information such as genetic variants, genomic fusions and aberrations to a circular genome, as proposed by the 'JavaScript' library 'BioCircos.js', based on the 'JQuery' and 'D3' technologies.
